bill.title: Athletic and extracurricular organizations; prohibit traveling more than 25 miles in radius outside local school district.
bill.description: An Act To Restrict The Travel Of Public School Athletic Teams And Extracurricular Organizations To A Radius Of 25 Miles For Competitions; To Provide That The Restriction Preempts Any Policies Or Regulations Promulgated By The State Board Of Education And The Mississippi High School Activities Association, Inc., That Apply To The Classification Of Schools And Allowable Travel Distances; To Authorize An Exception To Extend The Range Of Travel For Certain Schools And School Districts Upon A True And Valid Showing Of Unavailable Competitors Within A 25-mile Radius, To Certain Entities Before The Extension May Be Granted; To Provide That This Section Shall Not Apply To Travel To Certain Post-season Competitions; And For Related Purposes.
